title: Exporting multiple files with the same name but different directories to a zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window
2. Select both projects created earlier
3. Give the zip file a name (such as test.zip)
4. Begin the export to zip file

OB:
When attempting to export multiple files with the same name but different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up indicating that problems were encountered during export. The details in the error message point to the file with the same name in project2 as the problem.
EB: The zip file should be created successfully without any error messages.
SR:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window
2. Select both projects created earlier
3. Give the zip file a name (such as test.zip)
4. Begin the export to zip file
5. Verify that the zip file is created without any error messages.
